categories: Category:Empire of the Hand military units

nodes.text: Gray Squadron was a starfighter squadron that served the Empire of the Hand. The squadron was commanded Baron Soontir Fel and it was assigned to the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Admonitor. In 8 ABY, Gray Squadron was deployed during a battle on the planet Quethold, against the combined forces of the warlord Nuso Esva and the Quesoth species.
